column4: erm, how do i get 7.04 to detect my wireless card? i had it turned off when i did my install.
sorry i'm a noob..
so ya know how i can fix it?
no i dont see it
wireless support should be installed no matter what
brand/model of card
*which* sony vaio
quite possibly an intel card!
one sec, this channel is soooo busy
please pastebin the output of lspci WHILE your wireless card is on/enabled
ok what do i type?
do you know what pastebin is?
I'm on a different puter...
hmm, can you connect the laptop via an ethernet cable?
no, we've been trying to do that all night
well, unfortunately you're going to have to type it out
in a terminal window on your laptop, type lspci
you could also copy paste it into a text document
then save it to a flash drive or something, bring it over to this machine and email it to me
you still here?
ok can i pm it to you?
fine
